product_name: Suunto Ambit3 Sport Sapphire Heart Rate Monitor
long_description: With a highly scratch- and impact-resistant sapphire crystal, the Suunto Ambit3 Sapphire Sport GPS heart rate monitor tracks and analyzes your performance to help you become the best you can be.
short_description: With a highly scratch- and impact-resistant sapphire crystal, the Suunto Ambit3 Sapphire Sport GPS heart rate monitor tracks and analyzes your performance to help you become the best you can be.
